title: Hack and Slash
description: When you attack an enemy in melee

crit.description: On a 10+, you deal your damage to the enemy and either:
options: Deal +1d6 damage but expose yourself to the enemy’s attack

success.description: On a 7–9, you deal your damage to the enemy and the enemy makes an attack against you

title: Volley
description: When you take aim and shoot at an enemy at range

crit.description: On a 10+, you have a clear shot—deal your damage

success.description: On a 7–9, choose one (whichever you choose you deal your damage)
options: You have to move to get the shot placing you in danger as described by the GM
You have to take what you can get: -1d6 damage
You have to take several shots, reducing your ammo by one

title: Defy Danger
description:
When you act despite an imminent threat or suffer a calamity, say how you deal with it and roll. You can do so by:
-powering through  -getting out of the way or acting fast  -enduring  -thinking quick  -sheer mental fortitude  -using charm and social grace

crit.description: On a 10+, you do what you set out to, the threat doesn’t come to bear

success.description: On a 7–9, you stumble, hesitate, or flinch. The GM will offer you:

title: Defend
description: When you stand in defense of a person, item, or location under attack. As long as you stand in defense, when you or the thing you defend is attacked you may spend hold, 1 for 1, to choose an option

options: Redirect an attack from the thing you defend to yourself
Halve the attack’s effect or damage
Open up the attacker to an ally giving that ally +1 forward against the attacker
Deal damage to the attacker equal to your level

title: Spout Lore
description: When you consult your accumulated knowledge about something

crit.description: On a 10+, the GM will tell you something interesting and useful about the subject relevant to your situation

success.description: On a 7–9, the GM will only tell you something interesting—it’s on you to make it useful

title: Discern Realities
description: When you closely study a situation or person. Take +1 forward when acting on the answer(s)

crit.description: On a 10+, ask the GM 3 questions
options: What should I be on the lookout for?
What here is useful or valuable to me?
What here is not what it appears to be?

title: Parley
description: When you have leverage on a GM Character and manipulate them. Leverage is something they need or want

crit.description: On a 10+, they do what you ask if you first promise what they ask of you

success.description: On a 7–9, they will do what you ask, but need some concrete assurance of your promise, right now

title: Aid or Interfere
description: When you help or hinder someone

crit.description: On a 10+, they take +1 or -2 to their roll, your choice

success.description: On a 7–9, they still get a modifier, but you also expose yourself to danger, retribution, or cost
